Package com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Class ServerReconnectFilter.ConnectFailEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.utils.Event
      • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.ReconnectFilter.ConnectFailEvent
        • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.ServerReconnectFilter.ConnectFailEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UsesCustomNull
    Enclosing interface:
    ServerReconnectFilter
    public static class ServerReconnectFilter.ConnectFailEvent
extends ReconnectFilter.ConnectFailEvent
implements UsesCustomNull
    Structure passed to ReconnectFilter.onConnectFailed(ReconnectFilter.ConnectFailEvent) to provide more info about how/why the connection failed.

    • Method Summary

      • history

        public final ServerReconnectFilter.ConnectFailEvent[] history()
        Returns a chronologically-ordered list of all ServerReconnectFilter.ConnectFailEvent instances returned through ReconnectFilter.onConnectFailed(ReconnectFilter.ConnectFailEvent) since the first call to BleDevice.connect(), including the current instance. Thus this list will always have at least a length of one (except if isNull() is true). The list length is "reset" back to one whenever a BleDeviceState.CONNECTING_OVERALL operation completes, either through becoming BleDeviceState.INITIALIZED, or BleDeviceState.BLE_DISCONNECTED for good.

      • isNull

        public final boolean isNull()
        Returns whether this ServerReconnectFilter.ConnectFailEvent instance is a "dummy" value. For now used for ReconnectFilter.ConnectionLostEvent.connectionFailEvent() in certain situations.
        Specified by:
        isNull in interface UsesCustomNull

      • shouldBeReportedToUser

        public final boolean shouldBeReportedToUser()
